definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
St John's, capital of Labrador and Newfoundland province, Canada

sentences.english: Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖顶和圣约翰山高地后面的，是索瓦宁森林。

sentences.english: Covenant base ship and fleet are here en masse guarding Delta Halo.
sentences.chinese: 圣约人的基地飞船和舰队都在这里守卫德尔塔光晕。

sentences.english: The UNSC fleet MAC rounds impacted on the Covenant destroyer.
sentences.chinese: UNSC舰队的MAC炮弹冲击着圣约人的驱逐舰。

sentences.english: There is a sense in which the entire Decalogue was limited to the covenant community only.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，整个十诫是只限于圣约群体的。

sentences.english: Team Katana, Team Gladius, Covenant activity in Zone 67.
sentences.chinese: 武士刀小队，短剑小队，圣约人在67号地区活动。

sentences.english: There are abundant Redfish in Daytona Beach, Titusville and St. John's River.
sentences.chinese: 有丰富的鲑鱼在托纳滩，泰特斯维尔和圣约翰河。

sentences.english: He suddenly beheld the table-land of Mont-Saint-Jean cleared, and the van of the English army disappear.
sentences.chinese: 他望见圣约翰山高地突然空虚，英军的前锋不见了。

sentences.english: John the Baptist himself gets martyred.
The church is both the universal and local Christ confessing covenant community.
sentences.chinese: 教会同时是普世性和地方性的，认信基督的圣约团体。

sentences.english: They venerate the Ventari Tablet as their most sacred artifact and testament.
sentences.chinese: 希尔瓦里人尊凡特里石碑为他们最重要的神器和圣约。

sentences.english: The surviving Covenant ships struggled to accelerate out of the gravity well.
sentences.chinese: 幸存的圣约人舰队加速逃离了重力场。

sentences.english: The scene at St. John’s hospital was equally overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 圣约翰医院的情景同样悲惨。

sentences.english: Similarly, these covenants are not always explicit in every passage.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这些圣约在所有的经文中也不总是很清楚的。

sentences.english: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant;
sentences.chinese: 向我们列祖施怜悯，记念他的圣约。

sentences.english: From this angle Tom saw the Covenant cruisers over the field.
sentences.chinese: 从这个角度，汤姆看见圣约人巡洋舰在战场上方。

sentences.english: When could this covenant Hosea is speaking of, then, have been established?
sentences.chinese: 那么，何西阿所说的这个圣约究竟是在何时设立的呢？

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Protestant)/also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics
the Pentateuch/the five books of Moses in the Old Testament
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
